channel.title: Scronix 2.0
channel.description:
[img]http://scronix.org/images/logo.png[/img]
Scronix is a project I used to have a few months ago. I retired from it because I lost interest in it but now we're back, currently in BETA-mode.
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/rh4phi.png[/img] http://scronix.org
[u][b]Website Content[/b][/u]
[ul][li]SMF 2.0.4 powered forum.[/li] [li]Exclusive customized theme (Premium DzinerStudio theme).[/li] [li]Premium security plug-ins.[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Client Content[/b][/u]
[ul][li]602 Animations and GFX.[/li] [li]474 Mapdata, gameframe and objects.[/li] [li]Fullscreen, resizable and fixed screen options (Member +).[/li] [li]100% Quick prayers.[/li] [li]100% Curses added.[/li] [li]Autocasting.[/li] [li]Custom loading bar & Login field.[/li] [li]Auto Cache Downloader.[/li] [li]A LOT more, check it out yourself![/li][/ul]
[u][b]Server Content[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Custom minigames.[/li] [li]Perfect combat.[/li] [li]Almost all skills rewritten.[/li] [li]Custom Trimming skill.[/li] [li]Castle Wars.[/li] [li]100% Quick prayers.[/li] [li]100% Curses added.[/li] [li]Summoning.[/li] [li]Full Bounty Hunter.[/li] [li]A LOT more, check it out yourself![/li][/ul]
[u][b]Development Team[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Louis: Content & Client.[/li] [li]Jet: Content.[/li] [li]Rawrikitty: Graphics Designer.[/li] [li]Jesse: Website & Administration.[/li][/ul]
[u][b]Support Images[/b][/u] #1: [img]http://scronix.org/images/logo.png[/img] #2: [img]http://scronix.org/images/banner.png[/img] #3: [img]http://scronix.org/images/support.png[/img]
[u][b]Media[/b][/u]
[img]http://scronix.org/images/banner.png[/img]
[img]http://scronix.org/images/thread/1.png[/img]
Tab to reply to personal messages [img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/5176/lgt66c9.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ZMp0V6X.png[/img] Great for when you're busy, or you don't want to click three times to reply!
Castle Wars [img]http://i.imgur.com/wr7iBOk.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/11wKlV3.png[/img] A great minigame which is safe for everyone to play!
A fantastic loading and log-in screen with a scale of how strong your password is, if it's under 6 letters, you can't use it as it's too insecure.
[img]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/4788/lgtad69.png[/img] [img]http://img541.imageshack.us/img541/9038/lgtdf27.png[/img]
[img]http://img542.imageshack.us/img542/8236/lgtb14e.png[/img]
A brand new custom skill handwritten by Louis with over 400 lines! You can trim rune armour, use instrements with it to give it a golden trim, then soak it in a golden liquor to gild it, or you can rub it all off with a damp cloth. You can attach spikes to certain pieces of armour to infuse them with the power of bandos, or rub special powders into corrupt PvP armours to stop them from degrading and much more...
[img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/4088/lgt587f.png[/img]
A resizable and fullscreen client.
[img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/4299/lgt91c8.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/M8rZaXe.png[/img]
Farming.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/TBzo1Xq.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Wy7OjRf.png[/img]
Every Skillcape and an array of emotes.
[img]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/8572/lgt353ac.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/OTP7zVD.png[/img]
Working items kept on death interface with working factors (Skulls and prayers).
[img]http://i.imgur.com/FkGd3wz.png[/img]
Working clan chat with ranks.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/t4iO1YO.png[/img]
Extensive banking options
[img]http://i.imgur.com/ZYts8AF.png[/img]
Increased draw distance and HD textures.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/sVKSO8i.png[/img]
Plenty of higher revision emotes so you can dance till your heart's content.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1k5bi2B.png[/img]
Prayer draining and overheads.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/43KzknK.png[/img]
Working ectophial.
Working curses with effects AND quick prayer.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Du8QuBJ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/tQ0EO8U.png[/img]
Summoning.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/05Ev11W.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/36HBW.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7N7V39o.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/jwaezpV.png?1[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uU3VYjP.png[/img]
Bandit training.
[img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/4659/lgt7cea.png[/img]

XP rate still isn’t shown :(.[/quote]

item.title: Scronix 2.0
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“Specials, post:17, topic:520561”]In my mind all I can hear is “Lost Legacy” repeating itself… There’s not a single edit?

EDIT: It’s 508 Mapdata…[/quote]
Just because it’s a look-a-like doesn’t mean it’s Lost Legacy. We didn’t even touch that server/client. If you think so, alright.

Elrick:

Lacks xp rate in info. Also, screenshots and other media should be put into a [spoiler] tag if we have one. If not then looks pretty well done.

MoparScape doesn’t support [spoiler] tags, :P. And thanks alot, I appericiate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Scronix 2.0
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“Arcik, post:15, topic:520561”][quote author=CoderJessee link=topic=639058.msg4307757#msg4307757 date=1370209051]
No need to be rude. And this works, it isn’t really necessary to have it look exact the same as RuneScape.
[/quote]
Was not rude, and would you like me to make a tutorial for you? Maybe everybody will do it the proper way and not use the same crappy client that was released awhile ago.[/quote]
Alright mate. Yeah that would be nice, even though we didn’t download a client that already had fullscreen implented :P.

Read full topic

item.title: Scronix 2.0
item.dc:creator: @CoderJessee CoderJessee
item.description:
@CoderJessee wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:12, topic:520561”][quote author=CoderJessee link=topic=639058.msg4307741#msg4307741 date=1370208224]

I don’t like your ugly login and how full screen is incomplete. I’m also not going to play since it’s only beta.

What’s so incomplete about it?

The chatbox for starters?

Lol? What actually do you mean, that didn’t make any sense.
[/quote]
He’s saying to not use XAT chatbox because it makes your site look very unprofessional.[/quote]
I know it is, but it works fine for now. We’ll remove it later on.

[quote=“Arcik, post:13, topic:520561”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=639058.msg4307746#msg4307746 date=1370208320]

I don’t like your ugly login and how full screen is incomplete. I’m also not going to play since it’s only beta.

What’s so incomplete about it?

The chatbox for starters?

Lol? What actually do you mean, that didn’t make any sense.

He’s saying to not use XAT chatbox because it makes your site look very unprofessional.
[/quote]

I’m saying it should look like this mother lover.

ignore the game aspects it was real rs[/quote]
No need to be rude. And this works, it isn’t really necessary to have it look exact the same as RuneScape.

Read full topic
